features: pH-BALANCED: Ultra-gentle formula designed to match and support your vulva’s natural levels.
SHAVE PROTECTION: The gel-to-foam texture creates a comfy barrier & helps prevent irritation.
SUPER-SENSITIVE INGREDIENTS: Made with lactic acid, aloe vera, and coconut-derived cleansers. Fragrance-free. 6.5 oz.
DERMATOLOGIST + GYNECOLOGIST-APPROVED: Dermatologist-approved for sensitive skin and gynecologist-approved for sensitive areas.
HOW TO USE: Apply like a shave cream, or use as a gentle pubic area cleanser. Rinse after. For external use only.
COMPLETE YOUR SET: Pairs perfectly with the Body Buffer, Razor Starter Kit, and Ultimate Skin Solution for an ultra-smooth shave experience.
body.description: For your most delicate shave job, meet V Smooth. A vulva-friendly shave gel specifically designed for pubic hair & skin, helping you get ultra-smooth while offering a gentle cleanse down there too. Made with super-sensitive ingredients like lactic acid and aloe, our creamy-foaming formula helps ward off shave irritation, plus it’s fragrance-free, gynecologist-approved, and pH-balanced to match your V’s natural levels. Use it to shave your pubic hair, cleanse your pubic skin—or both! For external use only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes yes yes
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is excellent, a godsend really. I have always had problems with soaps and body washes throwing off my V-pH, even body washes made for that specific region. This stuff is not only a V-pH balanced wash but doubles up as a downstairs shaving gel/soap. Perfection really. What more could you ask for? Been using it nearly 2 months now and have had no issues, no infections of the UTI or yeast kind. Sensitive skin approved, no scent that i can tell anyway, and very gentle. off to the makers of Billie!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minimal razor bumps
reviews.reviewText: This helps prevent razor bumps and helps with a smooth shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No smell, gentle
reviews.reviewText: Overall I love the pump bottle and it is veeery mild to no scent which is nice. Only reason it is not 5 stars is because there is ZERO lather, which I expected from other reviews (but didn’t anticipate how much I will need to use every time I use the product, to compensate for the lack of lather).It’s good for sensitive skin! (This is gentler than unscented of other brands I’ve tried, including Dr. Bronner’s).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I found this sooner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff! Will be buying again. Really helps with a smooth shave, inflammation or redness.. very smooth and a great light scent. Also wonderful for sensitive skin. I highly recommended especially for people with thicker hair, I leave it on a couple mins then shave and tadah! It’s great for the under arms too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: yoooooo i used this while shaving and i’m so itchy rn😭😭😭😭!! as a cleanser it’s good but idk if i would use it while shaving…

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cream for perfect shaving !!
reviews.reviewText: It works great with the Billie razor!! So smooth !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Billie V Smooth Shave Gel Plus Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: This Billie V Smooth Shave Gel Plus Cleanser works well when I need to shave. It doesn't bother me or cause any kind of irritation. It's gentle, and I don't get any razor burn when I use it. I also like the scent.
